page.title: 20SHOTESHAM/HOWE SUMMARY
page.content: All agree that this Conservation area, with a population of less than 500, is a pleasant, though not always convenient place to live. The{LANDSCAPE}is gently undulating, with many fields growing crops. There are 3 main woods of 46, 56 and 150 acres. There are also 3 areas of Commonland, 4, 5_6 and 48_50 acres. {HOUSING}mostly at 2 village centres, is restricted in growth and tends to be traditional in design. {LIFE STYLES}and{ENTERTAINMENT}tend to be Home orientated.{RECREATION}self_ motivated, due to lack of formal facilities. Unemployment is low in the area. {FARMING}is the main local industry The main{HEALTH}and{EDUCATION}care of villagers is undertaken out of the area. {TRANSPORT}6 bus services daily.
